projects.name: -Sphere (Online Exam Portal)
projects.description: -Sphere, a online proctoring solution meticulously developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP and MySQL. This dynamic platform is engineered to revolutionize online assessments by integrating robust security measures with user-friendly functionality.

projects.name: - (Food Waste Management System)
projects.description: Developed a dynamic and user-friendly web application to facilitate food donations using a tech stack comprising HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and SQL. The platform aims to connect donors with surplus food to local charities and organizations, ensuring a streamlined and efficient process for food redistribution.

experiences.description: Hands-on experience with Amazon AWS. Implemented secure AWS configurations for infrastructure. Designed and deployed scalable cloud architectures. Ensured cloud security through best practices. Automated infrastructure provisioning using AWS CloudFormation. Configured and managed Virtual Private Clouds (VPCs) for network security. Applied DevOps practices to streamline deployments and enhance efficiency.
